page.title: 12INTERVIEW cont.
page.content: Government decisions mainly affect Mr Taylor with the EEC,and especially the lack of agreement on the Common Agricultural Policy (Which decide prices). The area has several oast and barn conversions for housing with four oast and a barn having been converted to houses only 100 yards from Mr Taylor's house. The main social concern being the busy A 229 with all of the Cranbrook-Staplehurst traffic an could be a problem for turning off and for young children.Living in this area a car is a must when it is about 3 miles to Cranbrook and 1.5 to Staplehurst.
